channel.title: CVE Feed for Horner Automation -- Remote Compact Controller (RCC) 972

item.title: CVE-2022-2641|2024-09-17T02:05:41.381Z -- horner%20automation -- remote%20compact%20controller%20%28rcc%29%20972
item.description: Horner Automationâ€™s RCC 972 with firmware version 15.40 has a static encryption key on the device. This could allow an attacker to perform unauthorized changes to the device, remotely execute arbitrary code, or cause a denial-of-service condition.
